mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rmres(rmresNum, startDate, endDate, roomCode, reservNum, people, userName, tel, price) VALUES(SEQ_RMRES.NEXTVAL,#{startDate},#{endDate}, #{roomCode},#{reservNum},#{people},#{userName},#{tel},#{price})
INSERT INTO reserv (reservNum, memberNum, signSpot) VALUES(#{reservNum}, #{memberNum}, #{signSpot})
mapper.select: SELECT rmresNum, TO_CHAR(startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')endDate, rm.roomCode, rm.reservNum, people, userName, tel, ro.price FROM rmres rm JOIN reserv re ON rm.RESERVNUM=re.RESERVNUM JOIN room ro ON rm.ROOMCODE=ro.ROOMCODE

SELECT TO_CHAR(rm.startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')startDate, TO_CHAR(rm.endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')endDate, rm.reservNum, rm.people, rm.userName, rm.tel, rm.PRICE, s.SPOTNAME, ro.SAVEFILENAME, f.FLOORNAME, ro.roomName ,s.SPOTADDR2 FROM rmres rm JOIN reserv re ON rm.RESERVNUM=re.RESERVNUM JOIN room ro ON rm.ROOMCODE=ro.ROOMCODE JOIN floor f ON ro.FLOORNUM=f.FLOORNUM JOIN spot s ON f.SPOTCODE=s.SPOTCODE WHERE rm.reservNum=#{reservNum}
